name: hrevert/ht-time-zone
description: HtTimeZone is a Zend Framework 2 module to simplify working with timezones. This module is useful when your application users are located all around the world.

suggest.doctrine/dbal: If you want to use dbal types provided this module
suggest.zendframework/zend-filter: If you want to use the timezone converter(filters) provided this module
suggest.snapshotpl/zf-snap-geoip: If you want to use maxwind PHP API to detect client timezone
